name: Flesh, Blood, & Concrete
description:
Flesh, Blood, & Concrete is a free indie horror game by Letatlin Dev, otherwise known as Io. Created in 2020, the game follows the story of Lera, a depressed architect, as she explores a seemingly abandoned apartment building where she meets the meat child Nika.
Flesh, Blood & Concrete, often shortened to "FBC," can be completed between 30-120 minutes.

if you run into an error upon the game's start that mentions blend modes and you are using google chrome, you should be able to fix it by enabling hardware acceleration.
in order to save or access options, third-party cookies need to be turned on. why? both your progress and your configurations are stored in-browser as cookies. you can try playing with cookies turned off, but it will crash when you attempt to open the options menu. i'm working on a way to try to avoid this crash.
-
content warnings: meat and disembodied gore, general horror elements (unsettling images and sounds), an allusion to suicide, and some existential dread. if you feel like any of these themes would have a negative impact on you, please prioritize your own health and happiness!
if you run into any other errors, i'm very sorry! please message me on twitter @onisarashi and let me know.
